content: I think I'll consider Google Photos for cloud storage, since I already have a Google account and it's convenient to use. I'll also look into Western Digital external hard drives as a backup option. By the way, I've been meaning to sort out my phone case and screen protector collection, and I'm glad I got a new clear case with a slight glitter effect a few weeks ago. It's been doing a great job of protecting my phone, and I'm really happy with it so far.
